Loved spending time with the fab young people @6VTYouthCafe tonight with Cllr Bird. Care experiences, mental health, disengagement from school & more discussed. Disappointed though I didn't get the mac cheese. Had to make my own! #YOYP2018 #NewVoices https://t.co/soDqEiOBvG

In every nook & cranny of this city there are hugely talented young people and they need showcased. Moved to tears by this beautiful performance @6VTYouthCafe tonight. Hope to see more of them in #YOYP18 @Edinburgh_CC https://t.co/rH6I7dbTNJ
RT @CharterisCentre: @AlisonDickieSNP @CR_HFA - for your info (not tagged properly in first tweet!)

Some of the fab @CR_HA #art exhibition in the @CharterisCentre Great hearing about the work of the group, & more about dementia. Popping in to say hello to the folks themselves v soon. #community https://t.co/yNNMkIKe4C

'It gives me a chance to be somebody, even a little somebody, better than a nothing somebody!' Popped into See the @CR_HA #art exhibition in the @CharterisCentre . Fantastic art, fantastic work. https://t.co/hrpqIckuzm

Spent time with impressive & articulate young people at the fab @Canongateyouth who have been disengaged from mainstream education. Key poignant message - Don't write us off! Bullying, anxiety, exam pressures & listening amongst other issues discussed. #YOYP2018 https://t.co/12CBDwKfXg

@edinhelp @mhairijanemac @SteveAMBurgess @cameronrose Packed day yesterday & just on social media now. Thanks to @edinhelp & I hope you were happy with the response/action @mhairijanemac Good to hear from you.
@kim_harding @SteveAMBurgess @cameronrose Kim, just properly on social media now. I'll check that out first thing Monday.

Scotsfantastic! Huge talent at Currie Primary School's Scots Assembly yesterday. Pleasure to join them and present certificates. #amazingschools https://t.co/IYPZt0PL89

Ongoing work to re-imagine & improve Nicolson Square for the #community. Full house of residents, local businesses & partners tonight sharing ideas and steps forward. Delight to help organise & participate. https://t.co/nchR0Zm5Nb

Burns Day, and in the spirit of the bard...welcoming @TrinityAc_Edin & their #Erasmus peers from Germany, Sweden & Netherlands. Sharing ideas with each other about inclusion & peer support in their schools. Gotta love our young people! #YOYP2018 https://t.co/pEWaGDprkR

Spent time in the @JuniperGreenPS pit this week with inspirational pupils from P1 to P7. Sharing their Children's Parliament work & how they are each using their chosen global goal to make a difference. #amazingschools https://t.co/GnvX9ZQo7u

Why buy toys when you can visit the Toy Library? And meet some other parents & some support in the process. Great to pop into the Toy Library at King's Hall Church in S Clerk St yesterday. https://t.co/heH7apYHnu

10 tips from an author...read, read, read, read, read, read, read, read, read and, yes, read! What a pleasure to join @ColintonPrimary this morning for their @ReadingForce event with Vivian French. Story writing tips galore! https://t.co/RFMwshNuSG

Sorry folks but my surgery at Newington Library is cancelled for tomorrow. I may though be popping into this event in the Meadows, so feel free to come and chuck a snowball at your local Councillor. Bet you've not had that offer before! https://t.co/7HWtlQA7PV
